Desc.entry: An adult mixed ability wind band with a minimum age of 18 years. Has no particular grade requirements, but a good standard of musicianship is expected as grade 3-5 music is played. Offers a chance to meet and play music for pleasure in a relaxed friendly atmosphere, as well as the opportunity to play at a variety of venues and enter local and national competitions. All types of music played, from the well known to the more traditional.
